facts: In Strasbourg, France, in 1518, a woman named Frau Troffea started dancing in the street. Within a month, around 400 people joined her in a compulsive dance that lasted for weeks, leading to exhaustion and even death. The cause remains a mystery.
Cows have been shown to form close friendships and can become stressed when they are separated from their best buddies.
Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible.
Astronauts returning from the moon have reported that moon dust smells similar to gunpowder.
While Mount Everest is the highest peak above sea level, the base of Mauna Kea in Hawaii is below sea level, making it the tallest mountain from base to summit.
The village of Oymyakon in Russia is one of the coldest inhabited places on Earth, with temperatures dropping below -50 degrees Celsius (-58 degrees Fahrenheit).
In the animal kingdom, male Ad√©lie penguins often propose to their mates by offering them a pebble.
